title: Exotic Draw Hunt - Laguna Atascosa | TexAgs
text: Anyone have any experience hunting this area? I was selected to hunt the Laguna Atascosa NWR - Bahia Grande Unit. This will be a rifle exotic hunt and we'd primarily be going after Nilgai.
